items.sentence: Tom shouldn't have ever tried doing that alone.
My best friend works for an NGO in Afghanistan.
Their party won the most votes in the election.
Our car broke down in the middle of the street.
Did you tell Tom why you don't want to do that?
Are we going to be able to complete everything?
There was a lot of drinking going on yesterday.
Tom will leave as soon as he's finished eating.
The more you sleep, the sooner you'll get well.
It's hard to sleep at night when it's this hot.
I don't usually go to bed until after midnight.
Three men wearing masks set fire to Tom's home.
We don't need to find out what we already know.
Let's wait until we hear what Tom's opinion is.
Tom asked me if I remembered where we'd parked.
Tom asked me which language I could speak best.
I'll remember this day for the rest of my life.
How are Canadians different from everyone else?
Some of the nicest people I know are Canadians.
Tom walked over to Mary and introduced himself.
